snippet: The parents’ visit to campus has become a hyper-organized extravaganza filled with big events and, often, big stress.
abstract: Bruce Feiler This Life column says family weekends at many colleges have become a hyper-organized extravaganza filled with big events and, often, big stress; some parents are thrilled to have an excuse to drop in on their children, while others find the whole thing a bit overwhelming.
lead_paragraph: The parents’ visit to campus has become a hyper-organized extravaganza filled with big events and, often, big stress.

headline.seo: College Family Weekend Isn’t Just for Parents Anymore
headline.main: This Weekend, College Is for Everyone
headline.print_headline: This Weekend, College Is for Everyone
